column1: Human and Social Data Science - MSc
column3: School of Mathematical and Physical Sciences
column5: Data is everywhere and affects every aspect of our lives and our society – from fitness trackers to online shopping to social media. Data is used to understand human behaviour, and to inform policy, journalism and strategy.This course is for you if you:are a graduate in the social sciences, business or the humanitieshave an interest in data and data-driven methodsplan a career in the field of data science.Understanding how and why data is used, and the societal and ethical implications of doing so, are at the heart of this MSc. On the course, you’ll explore:
column7: Find the specific fees for your chosen programme on the website
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
